description.narrative: The Performance Linked Aid (PLA) Budget Measure is an incentive-based form of aid that provides additional funding in recognition of progress and achievements by partner governments in identified policy or administrative reforms and/or improvements in specific development outcomes. PLA is a two-step process where reform is first identified and milestones agreed upon. The second step is an assessment of where and how PLA payments can be directed if partner governments achieve the agreed milestones.
